events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The issue has been categorized under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for a money back.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Lisa for handling the refund request.
Hello, I'm Lisa from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the refund so I can proceed with the process?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small and Iâ€™d like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund request and you will receive an email with return instructions shortly.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the clear instructions and your support processing this return.
The refund case has been resolved with return instructions sent and refund processing underway.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing the case now that the refund has been confirmed and no further issues were reported.
